name: Zynq
headline: Office management platform that optimizes your hybrid workplace
description:
Zynq makes company offices smart with an all-in-one workspace management platform that redefines the relationship between people x space x time.

Companies using Zynq can fully embrace the Hybrid Office, giving employees a quick way to find the best time and space to collaborate, meet with guests, and much more.

founders.name: Zerzar Bukhari, Founder
founders.description:
Ex-PM at Google & Microsoft
Finance @ Harvard
Engineering @ UToronto

founders.name: David Cottrell, Founder
founders.description:
Ex-Google Software Engineer in G Suite
1st Engineer at Spacebar
Computer Science and Math at McGill

[![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/logo.svg)](https://zynq.io/<#>) [Features](https://zynq.io/</features>)[Blog](https://zynq.io/</blog/>)[Pricing](https://zynq.io/<#pricing>)[Login](https://zynq.io/</app/workspace>)[View Demo](https://zynq.io/<#getstarted>)
THE OFFICE OF THE FUTURE
#  Office Management for the Flexible Future 
###  The all-in-one office management platform that organizes people, space and time. 
[View Demo](https://zynq.io/<#getstarted>)[Login](https://zynq.io/</app/workspace>)
TRUSTED BY THE BEST 
![](https://storage.googleapis.com/zynq-app.appspot.com/img_92dae90f16ebc273fdf17a9e38272b4043d402f89fd086c30bb436fc08e4bad0)
##  Make the office the heart of your company culture 
##### Give your employees the tools to maximize face-to-face time
### Bookable Desks
#####  Flexibility is key to a productive & happy workforce. Let your employees choose when they'd like to come to the office and where they'll sit. 
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/icon-6-pillar-2.svg)
### Contact Tracing
#####  Tracing interactions limits spread. Zynq constantly monitors office interactions to help craft targeted messages to anyone that may have been exposed. 
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/icon-6-pillar-3.svg)
### Access & Tracking
#####  Exercise full control over who can come into your offices and reserve specific areas. Track every office visit and build custom reports for a complete analysis. 
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/icon-6-pillar-1.svg)
### Buddies Sync
#####  Get notified when close colleagues are planning to come in. Sync schedules and sit together with a simple click of a button. 
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/icon-6-pillar-4.svg)
### Configurable Workspaces
#####  Your engineers need a different setup than your sales team. Craft the perfect environment using asset types. 
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/icon-6-pillar-5.svg)
### Enterprise Integration
#####  Zynq seamlessly integrates with many of your existing software including Office & Google Workspace. That means one click sign-ins and automatic real-time data synchronization. 
[See All Features](https://zynq.io/</features>)
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/Shadow.svg)
ENTERPRISE ANALYTICS
## Actionable data at your fingertips
#####  Zynq monitors every office visit, interaction and request and makes this available to you via a dashboard. Export this data to Excel, Sheets or your existing data service with the click of a button. 
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/icon-af.svg)
#### Pre-Configured Reports
##### Build reports and have them hit your inbox.
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/icon-af-1.svg)
#### On-Demand Alerts
##### Get notified about what you deem important.
## Let's Get Started
Schedule a demo so we can learn more about your needs or Contact Sales. 
### Why do companies choose Zynq?
###  "Ease of use, 24/7 global support and simple admin dashboard. Training users on using the system was extremely easy and straightforward, the Zynq mobile apps are well developed and responsive." 
#### Zsolt Bizderi
##### IT, Deciem
###  "Really great. They are so fast at responding to requests and fixing issues. They are a really lovely team to work with. Always improving the app and introducing new features." 
#### Stacey Cracknell
##### Office Manager, MessageBird
###  "It's been a fantastic addition to our working life. We have received very positive feedback from staff around the use of this software." 
#### Darren Purnell
##### Facilities, TeachFirst
[ ![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/zsolt.jpeg)](https://zynq.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>) [ ![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/stacey.jpeg)](https://zynq.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>) [ ![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/darren.jpeg)](https://zynq.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
### View Demo
[Submit](https://zynq.io/<#>)
Thank you! We've received your information. Please go ahead and **Schedule a Demo below**. Someone will also be personally reaching out, shortly. 
Oops! Please enter a valid email, name & company.
![](https://zynq.io/static/website/images/segitiga.svg)
# Pricing
All pricing is in USD. Plans sold in sets of 25 users. 
Starter 
$2 
per user per month 
Key Features 
  * Complete Desk Management Suite
  * Web, iOS and Android Access
  * SSO Easy Sign-in with 2FA
  * Analytics Data & Dashboard
  * 100% Custom Floorplans
  * Neighborhoods 
  * Attendance Rules & Schedules 


Premium
$3 
per user per month 
Key Features 
Everything in Starter, plus: 
  * QR Check-in Concierge
  * Calendar Integration
  * Zynq Buddies
  * Contact Tracing
  * Safety Questionnaires
  * Desk Cleaning Tracking


Professional
$4 
per user per month 
Key Features 
Everything in Premium, plus: 
  * Employee Broadcast & SMS Alerts
  * Digital Signage
  * Custom Analytics & Reporting
  * Multi-Asset Types (ex. Parking)
  * HRIS Integration
  * Data Export


Enterprise
Contact 
for pricing 
Key Features 
Everything in Professional, plus: 
  * Multi-domain Setups
  * API Access
  * RFID Badge Integration
  * Multi-language Support
  * Dedicated 24/7 Support
  * Geo-customizations


Meeting Rooms 
starting at $20 
per room per month 
Visitor Management 
starting at $200 
per office per month

' fit_markdown='' fit_html=''
generated_description:
**Zynq: Your Partner in Hybrid Office Management**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2020 batch, Zynq is a San Francisco-based startup reinventing how we think about workplace efficiency in a hybrid setting. At its core, Zynq offers an all-in-one office management platform designed to optimize the interplay of people, space, and time.

### Mission and Vision
Zynq is on a mission to help organizations fully embrace the hybrid office model. This platform enables employees to swiftly locate optimal times and spaces for collaboration, meetings, and more. Essentially, it’s about making the office a central hub of productivity and culture.

### Features and Functionality
Zynq’s platform encompasses a range of features that cater to modern work needs:

- **Bookable Desks:** Flexibility is crucial. Employees can choose when to come to the office and where they’ll sit.
- **Contact Tracing:** In light of health concerns, Zynq monitors office interactions to help manage any potential health risks.
- **Access & Tracking:** Provides companies with complete control over office access and helps track employee visits with detailed reports.
- **Buddies Sync:** Employees can get notifications about when colleagues are in the office, fostering more in-person collaboration.
- **Configurable Workspaces:** The platform allows customization of workspaces to meet the varied needs of different teams.
- **Enterprise Integration:** Zynq integrates seamlessly with commonly used software like Office and Google Workspace, enhancing user experience.

In addition to these features, Zynq provides enterprise-level analytics, delivering actionable insights through a user-friendly dashboard.

### Team and Growth
With a lean team of just seven employees, Zynq exemplifies startup agility and dedication. They pride themselves on high-quality user support and continuous improvement of their platform.

### Pricing Structure
Zynq employs a flexible pricing model:
- **Starter Plan:** $2/user/month
- **Premium Plan:** $3/user/month
- **Professional Plan:** $4/user/month
- **Enterprise Solutions:** Customized pricing

This tiered approach ensures that companies of all sizes can find a suitable option for their needs.

### Customer Reception
Zynq has earned praise from its users for its ease of use and responsiveness. Testimonials from clients like Deciem and MessageBird highlight the platform's straightforwardness and the supportive team behind it.

### Conclusion
Zynq stands out by addressing a crucial need in today’s workspace landscape: a smarter, more streamlined approach to office management. As hybrid work becomes the norm, Zynq is poised to help organizations leverage their physical spaces more effectively.

For more information or to see Zynq in action, visit their website at [Zynq.io](https://zynq.io).
